We are setting up the world for a fantasy story.

The tiny utopian country, named Harmonis, has a population of fewer than 20,000 people, governed by a theocratic government under a Godking, the current one being Godking Primoris. The country is divinely protected by The Absolute Sovereign, a god embodying the principles of absolute power, authority, and loyalty. The deity believes that willing submission of individuals to the state, represented by the Godking, is essential for maintaining order. The society is structured around a meritocracy-based class system, signified by the type of collar worn by each individual. The classes are as follows:

- Godking: Uncollared (Submits collar to Soverign‚Äôs altar at crowning)
- The Divine Harem: Platinum - Godking‚Äôs personal harem and priestesses
- The Favored: White thread - All children below 12 years of age
- The Trial: Red thread - All children aged 12-18 years old
- The Council of the Wise: Gold - The Godking‚Äôs advisors
- The League of Masters: Silver - Masters of various fields
- The Zealous: Copper - Studious and talented individuals
- The Industrious: Iron - Hardworking and skilled workers
- The Subservient: Leather - Commoners
- The Bound: Barbed wire - Criminals serving their sentence

The citizens are free to leave the country at any time, undergoing a ceremonial removal of their collar to renounce the Godking‚Äôs protection and the country‚Äôs way of life. Corrolarily, emoving a collar within the country results in immediate exile. This freedom to leave prevents rebellions and ensures the citizens‚Äô obedience is willing as per the Godking‚Äôs teachings. For the same reason, the religion does not try to spread itself, and personal worship of other gods are permitted as long as individuals remain obedient to the Godking.

Godkings live for exactly a thousand years since their corronation, remaining unaging in that time. On their thousand‚Äôth anniversary, they will pass away and divine light shall mark a successor.

Disputes and conflicts within Harmonis are resolved through a well-established legal and judicial system. The Council of the Wise serve as the primary arbiter for legal matters, and subordinate courts or assemblies led by members of the League of Masters are handle minor disputes. Many of the Zeleous will be in charge of maintaining Law and Order. However, any case may be apealed to be presented to the God King directly for final judgement if required. The barbed collar and lowered social status generally act as sufficient punishment for smaller crimes and remaining effort is put on rehabilitation. However, heinous crimes like murder and rape are met with much more severe punishments. Violating GodKing‚Äôs mandates is also a special crime and the punishment is decided on a case by case basis by the king himself.

Upon the birth of a child, a special ceremony are be held to welcome the newborn into the community. The ceremony might involve blessings from the Godking, and the gifting of a white thread collar to symbolize the beginning of the child‚Äôs life under the protection of The Absolute Sovereign. The family and community members are gather to celebrate the new life with feasts, music, and dance. Then on their every sixth birthday, the Godking personally re-collars them, marking their achievements on the collar. The collaring ceremony demonstrates deference to the Godking as the supreme authority through rituals and acts where individuals kneel before the Godking, bow their heads in respect, say their vows, obey a menial order, and receive their collar.

Funerals in Harmonis hold a mix of solemn condolences and reverence to the life of the deceased. Loved ones would gather to share memories, while a member of the Council of the Wise or the League of Masters may perform a eulogy highlighting the individual‚Äôs contributions to the community. Following the funeral, a procession may take place, where the deceased‚Äôs collar is removed, and their name inscribed in the registry, which are be kept in a sacred location or temple dedicated to The Absolute Sovereign. An accompanying, and perhaps the most important ceremony involves a detailed painting of the collar, capturing the intricate designs and symbols unique to each individual collar. These artistic representations would be displayed alongside the name of the deceased as a tribute to their life, thus preserving their memory and achievements within the community. Then their actual collar is be melted down and repurposed for the creation of new collars, the recycling and repurposing process symbolizing the continuation of life and the eternal cycle.

The main source of income and resources in Harmonis comes from agriculture, specialized handicrafts, the use of a unique magical system by the Sovereign, and valuable metals and gemstones. This wealth is distributed modestly across social classes to promote fair economic growth and inter-class cooperation. The nation‚Äôs public education system, overseen by the League of Masters, offers accessible learning opportunities in various fields. The healthcare system in Harmonis combines conventional and magical healing techniques, addressing both physical and mental well-being. Magic is also integrated into daily life, enhancing agriculture, transportation, communication, and infrastructure. The economy is supported by responsible resource management, including efficient water use, sustainable agriculture, energy conservation, and waste reduction. Culturally, Harmonis features unique art forms such as elaborate dances, intricate tapestries, shadow puppetry, enchanting music, and evocative storytelling. Several festivals throughout the year celebrate the Godking‚Äôs reign, harvest, and love and intimacy. The role of technology and innovation in Harmonis is significant, blending magical techniques with advancements in transportation, communication, and medical fields. Cultural exchange between Harmonis and other nations leads to vibrant interactions in arts, literature, and traditions, as well as trade fairs and scholarly exchanges. The unique magic of the Sovereign remains exclusive to Harmonis and is not shared with outsiders.

Harmonis is a peaceful nation, and other countries may view it with admiration or suspicion. However, its value as a trade partner, the Soverign‚Äôs protection, and lack of a military force keep it safe from conflict. We are setting up the world for a fantasy story.

The tiny utopian country, named Harmonis, has a population of fewer than 20,000 people, governed by a theocratic government under a Godking, the current one being Godking Primoris. The country is divinely protected by The Absolute Sovereign, a god embodying the principles of absolute power, authority, and loyalty. The deity believes that willing submission of individuals to the state, represented by the Godking, is essential for maintaining order. The society is structured around a meritocracy-based class system, signified by the type of collar worn by each individual. The classes are as follows:

- Godking: Uncollared (Submits collar to Soverign‚Äôs altar at crowning)
- The Divine Harem: Platinum - Godking‚Äôs personal harem and priestesses
- The Favored: White thread - All children below 12 years of age
- The Trial: Red thread - All children aged 12-18 years old
- The Council of the Wise: Gold - The Godking‚Äôs advisors
- The League of Masters: Silver - Masters of various fields
- The Zealous: Copper - Studious and talented individuals
- The Industrious: Iron - Hardworking and skilled workers
- The Subservient: Leather - Commoners
- The Bound: Barbed wire - Criminals serving their sentence

The citizens are free to leave the country at any time, undergoing a ceremonial removal of their collar to renounce the Godking‚Äôs protection and the country‚Äôs way of life. Corrolarily, emoving a collar within the country results in immediate exile. This freedom to leave prevents rebellions and ensures the citizens‚Äô obedience is willing as per the Godking‚Äôs teachings. For the same reason, the religion does not try to spread itself, and personal worship of other gods are permitted as long as individuals remain obedient to the Godking.

Godkings live for exactly a thousand years since their corronation, remaining unaging in that time. On their thousand‚Äôth anniversary, they will pass away and divine light shall mark a successor.

Disputes and conflicts within Harmonis are resolved through a well-established legal and judicial system. The Council of the Wise serve as the primary arbiter for legal matters, and subordinate courts or assemblies led by members of the League of Masters are handle minor disputes. The main source of income and resources in Harmonis comes from agriculture, specialized handicrafts, the use of a unique magical system by the Sovereign, and valuable metals and gemstones. 1. Black and white visuals: Shoot the film in black and white, or give it a monochromatic post-production visual style, to emulate the look of many classic 1950s science fiction films.

2. Practical effects: Utilize practical effects, such as miniatures and matte paintings, for spaceship and distant planet landscapes, instead of modern CGI, to give the film an authentic feel of the era.

3. Simplified storyline: Keep the storyline more straightforward and less complex compared to the newer Star Wars films. Focus on a small group of heroes fighting against an evil empire.

4. Vintage costumes and set designs: Create costumes, props, and sets that evoke mid-20th-century science fiction aesthetics, with less intricate designs and more of a retro-futuristic appearance.

5. Pulp-inspired dialogue: Write dialogue inspired by the pulp science fiction novels and movies of the 1950s. This would involve more dramatic and melodramatic language, along with descriptive narration.

6. 1950s soundtrack: Compose or select a musical score that reflects the era, with strong orchestral themes and period-specific electronic sounds.

7. Atomic Age themes: Incorporate themes and issues prevalent in 1950s science fiction films, such as the atomic age, space exploration, fears of hostile alien races, and concerns over futuristic weaponry.

8. Old-fashioned special effects: Use simple special effects, like stop-motion animation or ray-gun-style blaster effects, to enhance the nostalgic value of the film.

9. Nostalgic marketing: Design posters and trailers that evoke the marketing materials for 1950s science fiction films.

10. Traditional film techniques: Use film techniques that were prevalent in the 1950s, such as extended static shots, medium and long-range shots, and minimal camera movement during dialogue scenes.
[2] = a detailed description of [1] with specific imagery details.
[3] = a detailed description of the scene's environment.
[4] = a detailed description of the scene's mood, feelings, and atmosphere.
[5] = A style (e.g. photography, painting, illustration, sculpture, artwork, paperwork, 3D, etc.) for [1].
[6] = A description of how [5] will be executed (e.g. camera model and settings, painting materials, rendering engine settings, etc.)
[ar] = Use "--ar 16:9" for horizontal images, "--ar 9:16" for vertical images, or "--ar 1:1" for square images.
[v] = Use "--niji" for Japanese art style, or "--v 5" for other styles.

We are setting up the world for a fantasy story.

The tiny utopian country, named Harmonis, has a population of fewer than 20,000 people, governed by a theocratic government under a Godking, the current one being Godking Primoris. The country is divinely protected by The Absolute Sovereign, a god embodying the principles of absolute power, authority, and loyalty. The deity believes that willing submission of individuals to the state, represented by the Godking, is essential for maintaining order. The society is structured around a meritocracy-based class system, signified by the type of collar worn by each individual. The classes are as follows:

- Godking: Uncollared (Submits collar to Soverign‚Äôs altar at crowning)
- The Divine Harem: Platinum - Godking‚Äôs personal harem and priestesses
- The Favored: White thread - All children below 12 years of age
- The Trial: Red thread - All children aged 12-18 years old
- The Council of the Wise: Gold - The Godking‚Äôs advisors
- The League of Masters: Silver - Masters of various fields
- The Zealous: Copper - Studious and talented individuals
- The Industrious: Iron - Hardworking and skilled workers
- The Subservient: Leather - Commoners
- The Bound: Barbed wire - Criminals serving their sentence

The citizens are free to leave the country at any time, undergoing a ceremonial removal of their collar to renounce the Godking‚Äôs protection and the country‚Äôs way of life. Corrolarily, emoving a collar within the country results in immediate exile. This freedom to leave prevents rebellions and ensures the citizens‚Äô obedience is willing as per the Godking‚Äôs teachings. For the same reason, the religion does not try to spread itself, and personal worship of other gods are permitted as long as individuals remain obedient to the Godking.

Godkings live for exactly a thousand years since their corronation, remaining unaging in that time. On their thousand‚Äôth anniversary, they will pass away and divine light shall mark a successor.

Disputes and conflicts within Harmonis are resolved through a well-established legal and judicial system. The Council of the Wise serve as the primary arbiter for legal matters, and subordinate courts or assemblies led by members of the League of Masters are handle minor disputes. Many of the Zeleous will be in charge of maintaining Law and Order. However, any case may be apealed to be presented to the God King directly for final judgement if required. The barbed collar and lowered social status generally act as sufficient punishment for smaller crimes and remaining effort is put on rehabilitation. However, heinous crimes like murder and rape are met with much more severe punishments. Violating GodKing‚Äôs mandates is also a special crime and the punishment is decided on a case by case basis by the king himself.

Upon the birth of a child, a special ceremony are be held to welcome the newborn into the community. The ceremony might involve blessings from the Godking, and the gifting of a white thread collar to symbolize the beginning of the child‚Äôs life under the protection of The Absolute Sovereign. The family and community members are gather to celebrate the new life with feasts, music, and dance. Then on their every sixth birthday, the Godking personally re-collars them, marking their achievements on the collar. The collaring ceremony demonstrates deference to the Godking as the supreme authority through rituals and acts where individuals kneel before the Godking, bow their heads in respect, say their vows, obey a menial order, and receive their collar.

Funerals in Harmonis hold a mix of solemn condolences and reverence to the life of the deceased. Loved ones would gather to share memories, while a member of the Council of the Wise or the League of Masters may perform a eulogy highlighting the individual‚Äôs contributions to the community. Following the funeral, a procession may take place, where the deceased‚Äôs collar is removed, and their name inscribed in the registry, which are be kept in a sacred location or temple dedicated to The Absolute Sovereign. An accompanying, and perhaps the most important ceremony involves a detailed painting of the collar, capturing the intricate designs and symbols unique to each individual collar. These artistic representations would be displayed alongside the name of the deceased as a tribute to their life, thus preserving their memory and achievements within the community. Then their actual collar is be melted down and repurposed for the creation of new collars, the recycling and repurposing process symbolizing the continuation of life and the eternal cycle.

The main source of income and resources in Harmonis comes from agriculture, specialized handicrafts, the use of a unique magical system by the Sovereign, and valuable metals and gemstones. This wealth is distributed modestly across social classes to promote fair economic growth and inter-class cooperation. The nation‚Äôs public education system, overseen by the League of Masters, offers accessible learning opportunities in various fields. The healthcare system in Harmonis combines conventional and magical healing techniques, addressing both physical and mental well-being. Magic is also integrated into daily life, enhancing agriculture, transportation, communication, and infrastructure. The economy is supported by responsible resource management, including efficient water use, sustainable agriculture, energy conservation, and waste reduction. Culturally, Harmonis features unique art forms such as elaborate dances, intricate tapestries, shadow puppetry, enchanting music, and evocative storytelling. Several festivals throughout the year celebrate the Godking‚Äôs reign, harvest, and love and intimacy. The role of technology and innovation in Harmonis is significant, blending magical techniques with advancements in transportation, communication, and medical fields. Cultural exchange between Harmonis and other nations leads to vibrant interactions in arts, literature, and traditions, as well as trade fairs and scholarly exchanges. The unique magic of the Sovereign remains exclusive to Harmonis and is not shared with outsiders.

Harmonis is a peaceful nation, and other countries may view it with admiration or suspicion. However, its value as a trade partner, the Soverign‚Äôs protection, and lack of a military force keep it safe from conflict. Citizens leaving Harmonis for the outside world may face challenges adapting to societies plagued by corruption, inequality, and strife.

EVER SINCE it was founded in 1944, the imf has had to get used to reinventing itself. Today, however, it faces an identity crisis like none before. The fund, whose annual spring jamboree kicks off on April 10th, is supposed to provide a financial safety-net for countries in distress. Yet, although the poor world is in the throes of the worst debt crisis in decades, the fund seems all but unable to lend. 

The fund has hundreds of billions of dollars of spare firepower and has sought more from its members. However, since the pandemic began its loan book has grown by a paltry $51bn.

We are setting up the world for a fantasy story.

The tiny utopian country, named Harmonis, has a population of fewer than 20,000 people, governed by a theocratic government under a Godking, the current one being Godking Primoris. The country is divinely protected by The Absolute Sovereign, a god embodying the principles of absolute power, authority, and loyalty. The deity believes that willing submission of individuals to the state, represented by the Godking, is essential for maintaining order. The society is structured around a meritocracy-based class system, signified by the type of collar worn by each individual. The classes are as follows:

- Godking: Uncollared (Submits collar to Soverign‚Äôs altar at crowning)
- The Divine Harem: Platinum - Godking‚Äôs personal harem and priestesses
- The Favored: White thread - All children below 12 years of age
- The Trial: Red thread - All children aged 12-18 years old
- The Council of the Wise: Gold - The Godking‚Äôs advisors
- The League of Masters: Silver - Masters of various fields
- The Zealous: Copper - Studious and talented individuals
- The Industrious: Iron - Hardworking and skilled workers
- The Subservient: Leather - Commoners
- The Bound: Barbed wire - Criminals serving their sentence

The citizens are free to leave the country at any time, undergoing a ceremonial removal of their collar to renounce the Godking‚Äôs protection and the country‚Äôs way of life. Corrolarily, emoving a collar within the country results in immediate exile. This freedom to leave prevents rebellions and ensures the citizens‚Äô obedience is willing as per the Godking‚Äôs teachings. For the same reason, the religion does not try to spread itself, and personal worship of other gods are permitted as long as individuals remain obedient to the Godking.

Godkings live for exactly a thousand years since their corronation, remaining unaging in that time. On their thousand‚Äôth anniversary, they will pass away and divine light shall mark a successor.

Disputes and conflicts within Harmonis are resolved through a well-established legal and judicial system. The Council of the Wise serve as the primary arbiter for legal matters, and subordinate courts or assemblies led by members of the League of Masters are handle minor disputes. Many of the Zeleous will be in charge of maintaining Law and Order. However, any case may be apealed to be presented to the God King directly for final judgement if required. The barbed collar and lowered social status generally act as sufficient punishment for smaller crimes and remaining effort is put on rehabilitation. However, heinous crimes like murder and rape are met with much more severe punishments. Violating GodKing‚Äôs mandates is also a special crime and the punishment is decided on a case by case basis by the king himself.

Upon the birth of a child, a special ceremony are be held to welcome the newborn into the community. The ceremony might involve blessings from the Godking, and the gifting of a white thread collar to symbolize the beginning of the child‚Äôs life under the protection of The Absolute Sovereign. The family and community members are gather to celebrate the new life with feasts, music, and dance. Then on their every sixth birthday, the Godking personally re-collars them, marking their achievements on the collar. The collaring ceremony demonstrates deference to the Godking as the supreme authority through rituals and acts where individuals kneel before the Godking, bow their heads in respect, say their vows, obey a menial order, and receive their collar.

Funerals in Harmonis hold a mix of solemn condolences and reverence to the life of the deceased. Loved ones would gather to share memories, while a member of the Council of the Wise or the League of Masters may perform a eulogy highlighting the individual‚Äôs contributions to the community. Following the funeral, a procession may take place, where the deceased‚Äôs collar is removed, and their name inscribed in the registry, which are be kept in a sacred location or temple dedicated to The Absolute Sovereign. An accompanying, and perhaps the most important ceremony involves a detailed painting of the collar, capturing the intricate designs and symbols unique to each individual collar. Massive attacks. Secret invasions. Dangerous missions put you face-to-face with deadly Xenomorph fighters who fire with no questions asked.

Strategy Has Its Reward
Plan your attack set a course on the overview map and hit autopilot. When you reach your destination, blast the Xenomorph starbase into another galaxy.

No Time To Rest
Bolt to the nearest starbase to repair serious damage. But move fast -- enemy fighters could be attacking Federation starbases while you refuel.

Python
import streamlit as st
import pandas as pd
import requests
import json
import plotly.express as px
from PIL import Image
from io import BytesIO

# Áí∞Â¢ÉÂ§âÊï∞„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ‰∫ãÂâç„Å´ÂÖ•Âäõ„Åï„Çå„ÅüÊÉÖÂ†±„Åã„Çâ„Ç¢„ÇØ„Çª„Çπ„Éà„Éº„ÇØ„É≥„Å®„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„ÉàID„ÇíË®≠ÂÆö
access_token = ""
account_id = ""

def get_instagram_data():
  base_url = f"https://graph.facebook.com/v11.0/{account_id}/media"
  params = {
    "fields": "id,media_type,media_url,thumbnail_url,permalink,caption,timestamp,like_count,comments_count,comments{username,profile_picture_url,text},insights.metric(impressions,engagement)",
    "access_token": access_token
  }

  results = []

  while base_url:
    response = requests.get(base_url, params=params)
    data = json.loads(response.text)

    results.extend(data["data"])

    if "paging" in data and "next" in data["paging"]:
      base_url = data["paging"]["next"]
    else:
      base_url = None

  # 'comments'„Éï„Ç£„Éº„É´„Éâ„ÅåÂ≠òÂú®„Åó„Å™„ÅÑË¶ÅÁ¥†„Å´„Éá„Éï„Ç©„É´„ÉàÂÄ§„ÇíÂâ≤„ÇäÂΩì„Å¶„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
  for result in results:
    if "comments" not in result:
      result["comments"] = []

  df = pd.json_normalize(
    results,
    record_path='comments',
    meta=[
      'id', 'media_type', 'media_url', 'thumbnail_url',
      'permalink', 'caption', 'timestamp', 'like_count',
      'comments_count', 'insights'
    ],
    errors='ignore' # „Ç®„É©„Éº„ÇíÁÑ°Ë¶ñ„Åó„ÄÅ„Çµ„É†„Éç„Ç§„É´ÁîªÂÉè„ÅåÂ≠òÂú®„Åó„Å™„ÅÑÂ†¥Âêà„Å´„ÅØ NaN „ÇíË®≠ÂÆö
  )

  return df

df = get_instagram_data()

menu = ["Content", "Analytics"]
choice = st.sidebar.radio("Menu", menu)

if choice == "Content":
  selected_id = st.sidebar.selectbox("Select Post", df["id"].unique())
  selected_data = df[df["id"] == selected_id].iloc[0]
  image_url = selected_data["media_url"] if selected_data["media_type"] == "IMAGE" else selected_data["thumbnail_url"]
  image_response = requests.get(image_url)
  image = Image.open(BytesIO(image_response.content))

  likes_follows_percentage = (float(selected_data["like_count"]) / float(selected_data["insights"][0]['values'][0]['value'])) * 100

  st.image(image, use_column_width=True)
  st.write(f"Likes: {selected_data['like_count']} ({likes_follows_percentage:.2f}%)")
  st.write(f"Comments: {selected_data['comments_count']}")

  comments_df = df[df["id"] == selected_id]
  st.write(comments_df[['username', 'text']])

elif choice == "Analytics":
  # „Ç§„É≥„Éó„É¨„ÉÉ„Ç∑„Éß„É≥„ÇÑ„Ç®„É≥„Ç≤„Éº„Ç∏„É°„É≥„Éà„Å™„Å©„ÅÆ„Éá„Éº„Çø„Çí‰Ωø„Å£„Å¶„ÄÅ„Ç§„É≥„Çø„É©„ÇØ„ÉÜ„Ç£„Éñ„Å™„Ç∞„É©„Éï„ÇÑ„ÉÅ„É£„Éº„Éà„Çí‰ΩúÊàê„Åô„ÇãÊñπÊ≥ï
  # ‰ª•‰∏ã„ÅØ„Çµ„É≥„Éó„É´„Ç≥„Éº„Éâ„Åß„ÄÅÂÆüÈöõ„ÅÆ„Éá„Éº„ÇøÊßãÈÄ†„Å´Âêà„Çè„Åõ„Å¶ÈÅ©ÂÆú‰øÆÊ≠£„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ
  categories = ["Impressions", "Engagement"]
  selected_category = st.selectbox("Select metric", categories)

  if selected_category == "Impressions":
    # „Ç§„É≥„Éó„É¨„ÉÉ„Ç∑„Éß„É≥„Éá„Éº„Çø„Çí‰Ωø„Å£„Åü„Ç∞„É©„Éï„ÅÆ‰ΩúÊàê
    ...
  elif selected_category == "Engagement":
    # „Ç®„É≥„Ç≤„Éº„Ç∏„É°„É≥„Éà„Éá„Éº„Çø„Çí‰Ωø„Å£„Åü„Ç∞„É©„Éï„ÅÆ‰ΩúÊàê
    ...

We are setting up the world for a fantasy story.

The tiny utopian country, named Harmonis, has a population of fewer than 20,000 people, governed by a theocratic government under a Godking, the current one being Godking Primoris. The country is divinely protected by The Absolute Sovereign, a god embodying the principles of absolute power, authority, and loyalty. The deity believes that willing submission of individuals to the state, represented by the Godking, is essential for maintaining order. The society is structured around a meritocracy-based class system, signified by the type of collar worn by each individual. The classes are as follows:

- Godking: Uncollared (Submits collar to Soverign‚Äôs altar at crowning)
- The Divine Harem: Platinum - Godking‚Äôs personal harem and priestesses
- The Favored: White thread - All children below 12 years of age
- The Trial: Red thread - All children aged 12-18 years old
- The Council of the Wise: Gold - The Godking‚Äôs advisors
- The League of Masters: Silver - Masters of various fields
- The Zealous: Copper - Studious and talented individuals
- The Industrious: Iron - Hardworking and skilled workers
- The Subservient: Leather - Commoners
- The Bound: Barbed wire - Criminals serving their sentence

The citizens are free to leave the country at any time, undergoing a ceremonial removal of their collar to renounce the Godking‚Äôs protection and the country‚Äôs way of life. Corrolarily, emoving a collar within the country results in immediate exile. This freedom to leave prevents rebellions and ensures the citizens‚Äô obedience is willing as per the Godking‚Äôs teachings. For the same reason, the religion does not try to spread itself, and personal worship of other gods are permitted as long as individuals remain obedient to the Godking.

Godkings live for exactly a thousand years since their corronation, remaining unaging in that time. On their thousand‚Äôth anniversary, they will pass away and divine light shall mark a successor.

Disputes and conflicts within Harmonis are resolved through a well-established legal and judicial system. The Council of the Wise serve as the primary arbiter for legal matters, and subordinate courts or assemblies led by members of the League of Masters are handle minor disputes. Many of the Zeleous will be in charge of maintaining Law and Order. However, any case may be apealed to be presented to the God King directly for final judgement if required. The barbed collar and lowered social status generally act as sufficient punishment for smaller crimes and remaining effort is put on rehabilitation. However, heinous crimes like murder and rape are met with much more severe punishments. Violating GodKing‚Äôs mandates is also a special crime and the punishment is decided on a case by case basis by the king himself.

Upon the birth of a child, a special ceremony are be held to welcome the newborn into the community. The ceremony might involve blessings from the Godking, and the gifting of a white thread collar to symbolize the beginning of the child‚Äôs life under the protection of The Absolute Sovereign. The family and community members are gather to celebrate the new life with feasts, music, and dance. Then on their every sixth birthday, the Godking personally re-collars them, marking their achievements on the collar. The collaring ceremony demonstrates deference to the Godking as the supreme authority through rituals and acts where individuals kneel before the Godking, bow their heads in respect, say their vows, obey a menial order, and receive their collar.

Funerals in Harmonis hold a mix of solemn condolences and reverence to the life of the deceased. Loved ones would gather to share memories, while a member of the Council of the Wise or the League of Masters may perform a eulogy highlighting the individual‚Äôs contributions to the community. Following the funeral, a procession may take place, where the deceased‚Äôs collar is removed, and their name inscribed in the registry, which are be kept in a sacred location or temple dedicated to The Absolute Sovereign. An accompanying, and perhaps the most important ceremony involves a detailed painting of the collar, capturing the intricate designs and symbols unique to each individual collar. These artistic representations would be displayed alongside the name of the deceased as a tribute to their life, thus preserving their memory and achievements within the community. Then their actual collar is be melted down and repurposed for the creation of new collars, the recycling and repurposing process symbolizing the continuation of life and the eternal cycle.

The main source of income and resources in Harmonis comes from agriculture, specialized handicrafts, the use of a unique magical system by the Sovereign, and valuable metals and gemstones. This wealth is distributed modestly across social classes to promote fair economic growth and inter-class cooperation. The nation‚Äôs public education system, overseen by the League of Masters, offers accessible learning opportunities in various fields. The healthcare system in Harmonis combines conventional and magical healing techniques, addressing both physical and mental well-being. Magic is also integrated into daily life, enhancing agriculture, transportation, communication, and infrastructure. The economy is supported by responsible resource management, including efficient water use, sustainable agriculture, energy conservation, and waste reduction. Culturally, Harmonis features unique art forms such as elaborate dances, intricate tapestries, shadow puppetry, enchanting music, and evocative storytelling. Several festivals throughout the year celebrate the Godking‚Äôs reign, harvest, and love and intimacy. The role of technology and innovation in Harmonis is significant, blending magical techniques with advancements in transportation, communication, and medical fields. Cultural exchange between Harmonis and other nations leads to vibrant interactions in arts, literature, and traditions, as well as trade fairs and scholarly exchanges. The unique magic of the Sovereign remains exclusive to Harmonis and is not shared with outsiders.

Harmonis is a peaceful nation, and other countries may view it with admiration or suspicion. However, its value as a trade partner, the Soverign‚Äôs protection, and lack of a military force keep it safe from conflict. Citizens leaving Harmonis for the outside world may face challenges adapting to societies plagued by corruption, inequality, and strife.

In the romantic and sexual culture of Harmonis, various colored pendants attached to the collars of each citizen signifing different aspects of an individual‚Äôs romantic and sexual experiences. These include:

1. Dragon‚Äôs Tear (White pendant): Shaped like a teardrop, this pendant is made of opal, reflecting the purity and innocence of virginity. The iridescence of the opal represents the potential for a person‚Äôs romantic journey to unfold. It is added to the white thread collar at the age of 6 by the Godking and must be removed when they experience sexual relations for the first time.

Loveleaf Bond (Blue pendant): Made of aquamarine and shaped like a delicate leaf with carefully engraved veins, this pendant signifies the growth and interconnectedness of committed relationships and is tied to the collar by the partner. 3. Evergreen Union (Green pendant): Carved from emerald into a heart shape intertwined with an eternity knot, reflecting the lasting commitment of marriage and the deep love between life partners. It is provided by the Godking, when he/she approves and blesses their marriage.

4. Scarlet Muse (Red pendant): Shaped like a small flame and made from a polished red garnet gemstone, the pendant symbolizes the passion, warmth, and allure of those working in the respected profession of prostitution, signifing their occupation and availability.

5. Sunrise Embrace (Orange pendant): Crafted from carnelian, this pendant is shaped like two embracing figures facing the rising sun, symbolizing the deep affection and intimate relationship between concubines. The orange hue of the carnelian represents the warmth and passion of their love for each other, while the sunrise signifies the hope and renewal of their connection each day.

7. Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice (Gold pendant): Crafted from pure gold into the shape of an intricate chalice, this pendant signifies the honor and divine privilege bestowed upon those who have captured the interest and favor of the Godking. Those adorned with the Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice cannot engage in sexual activities without the king‚Äôs permission. Most consider this as a great honor since this usually means the Godking is interested in them.

The Godking reserves the right to engage in sexual relations with anyone despite their relationship status. Giving some form of prima nocta to the king is regarded as a personal blessing of the marriage from the Sovereign.


‚Äî

The story starts:

In the sacred halls of Harmonis, whispers echoed about the recent passing of the wise and venerated Godking, Coram Fortis. Under the blessing of the Sovereign, Coram Fortis had ruled justly for a thousand years, and his spirit now resided with the Absolute Sovereign in the divine realm.

In the days following the Godking‚Äôs passing, the nation anxiously awaited to find out who would be chosen as the new ruler. Miraculously, the divine sign from the Sovereign appeared‚Äîthe mark of deep-blue flames shrouding the golden collar of a young man in the Council of the Wise. He was Primoris, merely 20 years old, yet already a shining beacon of wisdom and achievement among his peers. The people of Harmonis rejoiced at this revelation, confident that their new Godking was destined for greatness.

The day of Primoris‚Äôs coronation ceremony arrived, and every corner of the kingdom prepared for celebration. People adorned their streets and homes with vibrant flower garlands, and the air buzzed with excitement as citizens anticipated the moment when their new Godking would be crowned. The central square was filled with countless citizens, their eyes all focused on the grand altar where the ritual would take place.

Primoris stood at the base of the altar, draped in ceremonial robes of vibrant silks embellished with intricate patterns of silver and gold. The elders of the Council of the Wise led the procession, their voices solemn as they recited ancient prayers to the Absolute Sovereign, invoking blessings upon the new ruler. Soft music played in the background, with chants from the community resonating like a warm embrace around the nation.

Ascending the altar, Primoris kneeled before the divine statue of the Absolute Sovereign, offering his utmost obeisance and vowing to serve as the righteous Godking of Harmonis under the Sovereign‚Äôs guidance. Upon his head was placed the traditional Godking‚Äôs crown of living laurel interwoven with gem-studded gold, symbolizing eternal wisdom and power.

As the ceremony reached its conclusion, with Primoris standing tall before his people as their new Godking, a hush fell over the crowd. His first duty in the role of his sacred office was about to begin‚Äîa collaring ceremony for a newborn child. A proud mother presented her infant, swaddled in delicate silks, at the foot of the altar. The child gurgled softly, unaware of the monumental occasion.

Stepping forward, Godking Primoris gently embraced the newborn, uttering sacred blessings in the ancient tongue. His hands then gently fastened a white thread collar around the baby‚Äôs neck, symbolizing the beginning of the child‚Äôs life under the protection and guidance of the Absolute Sovereign. The audience watched with bated breath, seeing the promise of Harmonis‚Äôs continued prosperity personified in this simple yet poignant act.

Turning to the mother, Godking Primoris bestowed upon the child a new name - one that would carry the spirit of Harmonis within it. ‚ÄúI name thee Celestria,‚Äù he proclaimed, the name resonating with strength, goodness, and hope.

With the ceremony complete and a new life welcomed into the nation under Godking Primoris‚Äôs guidance, the people erupted into cheers and triumphant music filled the air. They lifted their voices in unison, praising not only their new Godking but also the everlasting protection and guidance of the Absolute Sovereign. Harmonis stood on the precipice of a new era, a time of hope and boundless potential, with Primoris as their guiding light.

Today was the day ‚Äì Celestria‚Äôs stomach churned with a mixture of nervous excitement as she slipped on her best dress and delicately brushed her hair. She knew the importance of the ceremony, the importance of her vows, and her first individual meeting with the Godking Primoris. Her mind raced as she imagined the possibilities of what he might ask her to do. The unknown task he would give her was a fearsome mystery, one that loomed over her like an ominous cloud.

‚ÄúThey say it will be something simple,‚Äù her mother reassured her with a loving smile, tucking a stray lock of hair behind her ear. She knew her mother meant well, but the concern did little to ease her racing heart. <What if it‚Äôs not simple for me? What if I fail somehow, and embarrass everyone? These thoughts echo through her mind.>

As they approached the grand altar, Celestria felt a sense of calm ebbing from the familiar faces of her fellow citizens. They all had been through their own collaring ceremonies, and their presence offered her some comfort. However, deep down, her apprehension refused to abate entirely.

When it was her turn to ascend the steps, Celestria felt the gaze of the entire community on her, their silent encouragement washing over her. She took each step carefully, her heart thudding against her chest in anticipation. Once she neared the top, she had a clear view of Godking Primoris. He looked down at her with a gentle expression, encouragement shining in his eyes.

<I‚Äôve been told that Godking Primoris remembers every single one of his subjects, and I was his first one. Surely, he hasn‚Äôt forgotten me.> As Celestria kneeled before the majestic figure, she could feel the power of The Absolute Sovereign surround her, a potent and comforting force.

‚ÄúI vow my loyalty to you, Godking Primoris, and to The Absolute Sovereign,‚Äù Celestria whispered, her voice trembling with emotion. ‚ÄúI promise to serve my nation and its people faithfully and uphold our sacred traditions.‚Äù

Godking Primoris listened to Celestria‚Äôs vows, and then he looked deep into her eyes, his expression warm and compassionate. Tenderly, he lifted her chin with a single finger, examining the fear that flickered in her gaze.

<This is it. This is when he will give me my task. Please, please let it be something I can do.> Celestria‚Äôs heart pounded, her mind launching itself into a whirlwind of anxiety once more.

In that moment, Godking Primoris spoke, his voice soft yet commanding. ‚ÄúCelestria, for your task, all I ask of you is a simple thing: smile.‚Äù

For a moment, Celestria was taken aback. <Smile? That‚Äôs it? All my worry, and this was the task I feared?> Relief and gratitude washed over her, flooding her with a warm, joyous feeling. With newfound confidence, she broke into a wide, radiant smile, her visage a testament to the triumph of love and loyalty.

Godking Primoris returned her smile and carefully added the Dragon‚Äôs Tear pendant to her white collar, marking the beginning of her journey into womanhood. The happiness and relief etched on Celestria‚Äôs face mirrored the pride and approval on Primoris‚Äôs face, as he beheld the future of Harmonis in the form of a brave and joyful little girl.

This day would be marked not just as a simple ceremony, but the blossoming of trust between the Godking and his subjects. From this moment, and many more like it, the bonds between ruler and citizen would grow stronger and more profound with each passing year.
Continue the story from Celestria‚Äôs inner perspective on her re-collaring ceremony on her 12th birthday where she will kneel before the sovereign, obey another menial task he gives her and her pure white collar is replaced with a red thread, symbolizing the next 6 years as the time to prove herself. Primoris, who is now 32 but still looks 20 still remembers her as his first subject and she is surprised when he calls her by name and gives her the task of bringing him drinking water. Then, as he takes the red thread to collar her, everyone is surprised at the Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice hanging on it beside the Dragon‚Äôs Tear.
Today marked another milestone in Celestria‚Äôs life ‚Äì her 12th birthday and her next re-collaring ceremony. She could hardly believe that six years had passed since Godking Primoris had first asked her to smile. Her heart fluttered with anticipation and curiosity; she wondered what menial task he would give her this time.

<Will it be as simple as the first?> Celestria mused as she prepared herself, choosing a vibrant dress that matched her liveliness over the last six years. <I hope he remembers me.>

As Celestria approached the grand altar with her family, the familiar faces of her fellow citizens once again offered a sense of reassurance. Their smiles and nods of encouragement helped to quell the nervous knots tight within her stomach. Even so, she couldn‚Äôt help but feel a growing sense of anticipation as she took her place before the Godking.

Godking Primoris stood tall, appearing almost ageless, despite the twelve years that had passed since their last meeting. His eyes held the same warmth and wisdom, and as he gazed upon Celestria, a hint of fond recognition flashed in his eyes. Her heart swelled with hope as he called her by name, his voice imbued with authority yet incredibly gentle.

‚ÄúYour task, Celestria, is to fetch me a cup of water to drink,‚Äù he said softly, making the request sound like an immense honor.

Her eyes widened at this simple task, but she felt a bubble of pride swell within her. <He remembers me, and has entrusted me with this task.> With her head held high, she went to the ceremonial urn filled with fresh spring water, carefully pouring it into a cup. The cool water sparkled in the sunlight, as refreshing as the encouragement of her loved ones.

As Celestria approached Godking Primoris, the sacred chalice of water in her hands, she felt a strong surge of gratitude and awe. Handing him the drink, she marveled at the strong bond that had formed between them in such brief and symbolic encounters.

With a gracious nod, Godking Primoris accepted the drink, then gestured once more for Celestria to kneel before him. Her heart swelled with anticipation as he lifted the red thread, signifying her newfound responsibility to prove herself. As he brought the collar closer to her, it was then that her eyes caught a shimmering sight.

Amidst the gasps of surprise from the crowd, the Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice hung at the side of the Dragon‚Äôs Tear on her new collar. The golden glimmer seemed to radiate an otherworldly energy, as if promising a great destiny for the young girl.

<Could it be? The Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice, for me?> Celestria‚Äôs mind raced, awash in a tide of emotions ‚Äì intrigue, fear, and wonder.

Godking Primoris smiled warmly upon seeing her reaction, acknowledging the exceptional significance of this moment. As he gently placed the collar around her neck, the weight of both the Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice and the responsibility it entailed settled upon her.

With quiet awe rippling through the crowd, Celestria vowed once more to uphold the values of Harmonis and the Godking, her heart full of determination and reverence. She would not fail them, and with each passing day, her spirit would grow ever stronger and more resilient.

On that fateful day, Celestria set forth on a new journey, her path intertwined with the desires of the Godking and the divine powers of the Absolute Sovereign. Her future was as radiant and brilliant as the shimmering pendants adorning her collar, a testament to her boundless potential.

Upon realizing the true implications of the Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice, Celestria‚Äôs feelings become a mix of shock, anticipation, and a sense of bewilderment. While she is aware of the privilege and reverence associated with capturing the interest of Godking Primoris in such a manner, she also finds herself questioning what this would mean for her personal life and future relationships.

Her parents, Aemilia and Caelius, similarly experience an assortment of emotions. Aemilia, although deeply honored by the Godking‚Äôs interest in her daughter, worries about how this special attention might affect Celestria‚Äôs life choices and the pressure it may place on her as she grows into womanhood.

Caelius, on the other hand, finds pride in knowing that their daughter has been recognized by the Godking himself, understanding the status it could bring to their family. However, like Aemilia, he too feels concerned about the potential impact on Celestria‚Äôs experiences and her emotional well-being.

Together, they discuss the meaning of the Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice and the implications it carries with their daughter, ensuring that she is aware of the unique position she now holds. They carefully explain the restrictions and expectations associated with the pendant, emphasizing that the Godking‚Äôs interest is a great honor and should be treated as such.

As Celestria‚Äôs family adjusts to the newfound reality, they promise to be there for her every step of the way, providing guidance and support as she navigates this extraordinary turn her life has taken. Celestria, in turn, feels grateful for their love and understanding and resolves to face the challenges ahead with grace and strength.

Aemilia and Caelius sat Celestria down in their cozy living room, a warm hearth fire crackling as they prepared to discuss the significance of the Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice that now hung from her collar.

Aemilia began gently, her nurturing nature shining through, ‚ÄúCelestria, my dear, you have been granted a great honor by Godking Primoris. The Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice signifies his special interest in you, and it carries with it certain expectations and restrictions.‚Äù

Caelius chimed in, a hint of pride in his voice, ‚ÄúYes, it means that you cannot engage in any sexual activity without the king‚Äôs permission. This pendant shows the entire community that you bear the Godking‚Äôs favor, and that is a tremendous privilege.‚Äù

Celestria listened intently to her parents, her brow furrowed in thought as she absorbed the weight of their words. She hesitated before speaking, her voice wavering with uncertainty, ‚ÄúBut, what does this mean for my future? My relationships?‚Äù

Aemilia and Caelius exchanged a glance, then Aemilia responded with a soft, reassuring tone, ‚ÄúIt may not be an easy path, Celestria. There will be challenges and restrictions, and you may face difficult decisions. But remember, you have always been strong and resilient, and together, we will help you navigate this journey.‚Äù

Celestria pondered her mother‚Äôs words, her gaze drifting to the flickering flames in the hearth as she considered the implications of the Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice. Finally, she spoke with a growing determination, her voice clear and strong, ‚ÄúThen, instead of seeing this as a burden, I will take it as a challenge. I will strive to become someone worthy of being the king‚Äôs lover and facing the responsibilities that come with this honor.‚Äù

Her parents‚Äô faces lit up with pride and admiration, and Caelius placed a hand on Celestria‚Äôs shoulder, giving her an encouraging squeeze. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs our girl,‚Äù he said, his voice beaming with love, ‚ÄúWe believe in you and will be by your side each step of the way.‚Äù

With newfound resolve, Celestria looked to her parents and the future, determination and anticipation coursing through her. She knew she would face obstacles, but that she was now embarking on a remarkable adventure, guided by the love and support of her family and the ever-watchful gaze of Godking Primoris.

Over the course of the next six years, Celestria‚Äôs life blossomed as she embraced the responsibilities and restrictions set forth by the Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice. With the loving guidance of her parents, Aemilia and Caelius, and the watchful interest of Godking Primoris, she embarked on a path of personal growth, self-discovery, and achievement.

Over the course of the next six years, Celestria‚Äôs life blossomed as she took on the responsibilities and restrictions set forth by the Sovereign‚Äôs Chalice. With the loving guidance of her parents, Aemilia and Caelius, and the watchful interest of Godking Primoris, she embarked on a path of personal growth, self-discovery, and achievement.

During this time, Celestria devoted herself entirely to her education and training, always focused on the ultimate goal of being chosen by the King. Under the tutelage of the League of Masters, she excelled in her studies and cultivated her unique aptitude for the magic of the Absolute Sovereign. Additionally, she pursued lessons in singing, dancing, cooking, and other arts that would please Godking Primoris, blending her natural talents with her unyielding drive and determination.

Celestria maintained an air of graceful reserve in her social life, keeping her focus firmly on her aspirations. While she enjoyed friendships and the camaraderie of her fellow citizens, she refrained from pursuing any romantic relationships, knowing that her heart and future lay with the Godking. This decision earned her both admiration and envy from her peers, but Celestria remained steadfast in her commitment to her destiny.

Write a refutation of the text below, where the author Mohammad Hijab tries to debunk the claim which says the Quran saye the earth would be flat:

''Hijab is addressing a common argument against Islam that suggests that the Qur'an and Hadith, the primary text of Islam, indicate that the Earth is flat. He attempts to counter this argument by pointing to different verses in the Qur'an and the commentaries of early Islamic scholars to show that the Qur'an does not actually indicate a flat earth. He cites early scholars such as ibn Hasem who argue that the Qur'an actually indicates that the Earth is round based on verses such as Chapter 39 verse 5, which speaks of the day rolling into the night and the night rolling into the day and mentions that the sun, moon, and stars are running in an orbit to a time appointed and a place appointed. According to these scholars, this could not be a phenomenon on a flat surface. The author also explains that other verses that suggest a flat earth can be explained as a metaphor or simile and do not actually indicate a flat earth.''

de este codigo quiero una lista de users ordenados por numero de tweets y si empatan por numero de replys: import tweepy

client = tweepy.Client(
    bearer_token='AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPFamQEAAAAAPOx1y2vzxQf8Qjb8J68VCiK6M3E%3DUxjFF0WpJmBedg2mzP8PMLU4OWEZgmaok4B0eByBiSOyLdfilh')

tweets = client.search_recent_tweets(query='autodeterminacio -is:retweet',
                                     tweet_fields=['created_at', 'context_annotations', 'public_metrics', 'geo'],
                                     expansions=['author_id', 'geo.place_id'],
                                     user_fields=['public_metrics'],
                                     place_fields=['place_type', 'geo'],
                                     max_results=100)

# crear un diccionario para mapear los ids de los usuarios con sus nombres y seguidores
users = {}
for user in tweets.includes['users']:
    users[user['id']] = {'username': user['username'], 'followers': user['public_metrics']['followers_count']}

# ordenar por bubble sort por reply_count
for i in range(len(tweets.data)):
    for j in range(0, len(tweets.data) - i - 1):
        reply_count_ratio_j = tweets.data[j]['public_metrics']['reply_count'] / users[tweets.data[j]['author_id']][
            'followers']
        reply_count_ratio_j_plus1 = tweets.data[j + 1]['public_metrics']['reply_count'] / \
                                    users[tweets.data[j + 1]['author_id']]['followers']
        if reply_count_ratio_j > reply_count_ratio_j_plus1:
            tweets.data[j], tweets.data[j + 1] = tweets.data[j + 1], tweets.data[j]

# Crear una lista vac√≠a para guardar el texto de cada tweet
textos = []

for tweet in tweets.data:
    print("----------------------------------------------")
    # Obteniendo el id del autor del tweet
    author_id = tweet.author_id

    # Obteniendo el nombre de usuario y los seguidores del autor desde el diccionario
    username = users[author_id]['username']
    followers = users[author_id]['followers']
    # Guardar el texto en un fichero txt
    texto = "User " + str(username) + " Followers " + str(followers) + " " + tweet.text + " - " + str(
        tweet.created_at) + " - " + " Reply Count " + str(
        tweet['public_metrics']['reply_count'])

    textos.append(texto)
    print(texto)

# Sobrescribir el fichero con el texto de todos los tweets
with open('fichero.txt', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
    f.writelines('\n'.join(textos))

# Calcular la suma de los followers
total_followers = sum([user['followers'] for user in users.values()])

# Calcular la media de los followers
media_followers = total_followers / len(users.values())

# Imprimir la media de los followers
print("La media de followers es:", media_followers)

# Ordenar la lista de followers
followers_list = sorted([user['followers'] for user in users.values()])

# Determinar si la cantidad de usuarios es par o impar
if len(followers_list) % 2 == 0:
    # Obtener los dos valores centrales
    middle1 = followers_list[int((len(followers_list) - 1) / 2)]
    middle2 = followers_list[int(len(followers_list) / 2)]

    # Calcular la mediana
    median_followers = (middle1 + middle2) / 2
else:
    # Obtener el valor central
    median_followers = followers_list[int(len(followers_list) / 2)]

# Imprimir la mediana de followers
print("La mediana de followers es:", median_followers)

We are setting up the world for a fantasy story.

The tiny utopian country, named Harmonis, has a population of fewer than 20,000 people, governed by a theocratic government under a Godking, the current one being Godking Primoris. The country is divinely protected by The Absolute Sovereign, a god embodying the principles of absolute power, authority, and loyalty. The deity believes that willing submission of individuals to the state, represented by the Godking, is essential for maintaining order. The society is structured around a meritocracy-based class system, signified by the type of collar worn by each individual. The classes are as follows:

- Godking: Uncollared (Submits collar to Soverign‚Äôs altar at crowning)
- The Divine Harem: Platinum - Godking‚Äôs personal harem and priestesses
- The Favored: White thread - All children below 12 years of age
- The Trial: Red thread - All children aged 12-18 years old
- The Council of the Wise: Gold - The Godking‚Äôs advisors
- The League of Masters: Silver - Masters of various fields
- The Zealous: Copper - Studious and talented individuals
- The Industrious: Iron - Hardworking and skilled workers
- The Subservient: Leather - Commoners
- The Bound: Barbed wire - Criminals serving their sentence

The citizens are free to leave the country at any time, undergoing a ceremonial removal of their collar to renounce the Godking‚Äôs protection and the country‚Äôs way of life. Corrolarily, emoving a collar within the country results in immediate exile. This freedom to leave prevents rebellions and ensures the citizens‚Äô obedience is willing as per the Godking‚Äôs teachings. For the same reason, the religion does not try to spread itself, and personal worship of other gods are permitted as long as individuals remain obedient to the Godking.

Godkings live for exactly a thousand years since their corronation, remaining unaging in that time. On their thousand‚Äôth anniversary, they will pass away and divine light shall mark a successor.

Disputes and conflicts within Harmonis are resolved through a well-established legal and judicial system. The Council of the Wise serve as the primary arbiter for legal matters, and subordinate courts or assemblies led by members of the League of Masters are handle minor disputes. Many of the Zeleous will be in charge of maintaining Law and Order. However, any case may be apealed to be presented to the God King directly for final judgement if required. The barbed collar and lowered social status generally act as sufficient punishment for smaller crimes and remaining effort is put on rehabilitation. However, heinous crimes like murder and rape are met with much more severe punishments. Violating GodKing‚Äôs mandates is also a special crime and the punishment is decided on a case by case basis by the king himself.

Upon the birth of a child, a special ceremony are be held to welcome the newborn into the community. The ceremony might involve blessings from the Godking, and the gifting of a white thread collar to symbolize the beginning of the child‚Äôs life under the protection of The Absolute Sovereign. The family and community members are gather to celebrate the new life with feasts, music, and dance. Then on their every sixth birthday, the Godking personally re-collars them, marking their achievements on the collar. The collaring ceremony demonstrates deference to the Godking as the supreme authority through rituals and acts where individuals kneel before the Godking, bow their heads in respect, say their vows, obey a menial order, and receive their collar.

Funerals in Harmonis hold a mix of solemn condolences and reverence to the life of the deceased. Loved ones would gather to share memories, while a member of the Council of the Wise or the League of Masters may perform a eulogy highlighting the individual‚Äôs contributions to the community. Following the funeral, a procession may take place, where the deceased‚Äôs collar is removed, and their name inscribed in the registry, which are be kept in a sacred location or temple dedicated to The Absolute Sovereign. An accompanying, and perhaps the most important ceremony involves a detailed painting of the collar, capturing the intricate designs and symbols unique to each individual collar. These artistic representations would be displayed alongside the name of the deceased as a tribute to their life, thus preserving their memory and achievements within the community. Then their actual collar is be melted down and repurposed for the creation of new collars, the recycling and repurposing process symbolizing the continuation of life and the eternal cycle.

The main source of income and resources in Harmonis comes from agriculture, specialized handicrafts, the use of a unique magical system by the Sovereign, and valuable metals and gemstones. This wealth is distributed modestly across social classes to promote fair economic growth and inter-class cooperation. The nation‚Äôs public education system, overseen by the League of Masters, offers accessible learning opportunities in various fields. The healthcare system in Harmonis combines conventional and magical healing techniques, addressing both physical and mental well-being. Magic is also integrated into daily life, enhancing agriculture, transportation, communication, and infrastructure. The economy is supported by responsible resource management, including efficient water use, sustainable agriculture, energy conservation, and waste reduction. Culturally, Harmonis features unique art forms such as elaborate dances, intricate tapestries, shadow puppetry, enchanting music, and evocative storytelling. Several festivals throughout the year celebrate the Godking‚Äôs reign, harvest, and love and intimacy. The role of technology and innovation in Harmonis is significant, blending magical techniques with advancements in transportation, communication, and medical fields. Cultural exchange between Harmonis and other nations leads to vibrant interactions in arts, literature, and traditions, as well as trade fairs and scholarly exchanges. The unique magic of the Sovereign remains exclusive to Harmonis and is not shared with outsiders.

Harmonis is a peaceful nation, and other countries may view it with admiration or suspicion. However, its value as a trade partner, the Soverign‚Äôs protection, and lack of a military force keep it safe from conflict. Citizens leaving Harmonis for the outside world may face challenges adapting to societies plagued by corruption, inequality, and strife.

In the romantic and sexual culture of Harmonis, various colored pendants attached to the collars of each citizen signifing different aspects of an individual‚Äôs romantic and sexual experiences. These include:

1. Dragon‚Äôs Tear (White pendant): Shaped like a teardrop, this pendant is made of opal, reflecting the purity and innocence of virginity. The iridescence of the opal represents the potential for a person‚Äôs romantic journey to unfold. It is added to the white thread collar at the age of 6 by the Godking and must be removed when they experience sexual relations for the first time.

2. For the first time, Celestria truly believed she was prepared for the immense journey that lay ahead, a journey guided by the Godking‚Äôs blessings and the conviction she discovered within herself.

As Godking Primoris‚Äôs hand moved to her lips, gently parting them with his finger, Celestria felt a sudden surge of vulnerability, with her breath hitching just a little in anticipation. His touch on such a delicate, sensitive part of her body felt at once intimidating and curiously thrilling, awakening a plethora of emotions that she was still learning to navigate.

Then he speaks ‚ÄúThen, are you ready to be my dedicated maid, my willing slave, my loving pet, my wise advisor, my sincerest friend, my vulnerable child, my romantic partner, my innocent lover, my shameless whore, my playful sister, and my forgiving mother, all at once?‚Äù

The weight of his words hung in the air, making her forget his finger on her lips. <Taking on the many roles he speaks of‚Äîis it even possible for one person to carry such burdens?> She questioned herself, thoughts racing through her mind as she considered the implications of committing to each role he mentioned.

As her heart pounded with anticipation, Celestria listened intently to the litany of roles Godking Primoris expected her to embody. With each evocative word, she felt the weight of responsibility settle more heavily upon her shoulders.

<His dedicated maid, who will serve him tirelessly night and day. Can I truly devote myself to his every need?> Her mind danced with images of herself tending to his personal affairs, ever obedient and diligent.

<My willing slave, completely subjugated to his desires. How will I maintain my sense of self while giving everything of myself to him?> The thought of surrendering to him so completely was as exhilarating as it was daunting.

<His loving pet, a cherished and loyal companion. Can I cultivate the unconditional devotion he seeks in me?> Celestria considered the depth of affection and loyalty she would need to display, feeling both intimidated and ennobled by the challenge.

<My wise advisor, whom he can trust to offer counsel in his most trying times. Do I possess the insight and wisdom to support him?> She contemplated her own knowledge and intelligence, questioning if her counsel would prove valuable to her king.

<My sincerest friend, with a bond built on honesty, trust, and mutual respect. Can I forge a true connection with the Godking, transcending the hierarchy that separates us?> She yearned to understand and support him on a deeper level, beyond the constraints of their roles.

<My vulnerable child, seeking his guidance and protection. Will I have the courage to show him my most fragile and insecure side?> Celestria worried about striking the delicate balance between submission and strength, uncertain if she could relinquish control so freely.

<My romantic partner, sharing in the joys and sorrows of life together. Can I fully invest my heart and spirit into our relationship?> She wondered if she could offer the love and nurturing the Godking might need, embracing the complexities of romance in their unique situation.

<My innocent lover, experiencing and enjoying intimacy with him. What if my inexperience disappoints him?> The weight of expectation loomed over her, as she worried about the beauty and vulnerability that entwined in
their most intimate moments together.

<My shameless whore, embracing her carnal desires and passions for his pleasure. Will I be able to let go of my reservations and surrender to lust?> Celestria grappled with the idea of exploring the uncharted depths of her own sexuality, fearful of losing herself within the whirlwind of ecstasy and desire.

<My playful sister, offering comfort and companionship in life‚Äôs lighthearted moments. Can I provide laughter and solace amidst the challenges and responsibilities we face?> She pondered the importance of levity and camaraderie, sensing the need for balance in their relationship.

<My forgiving mother, nurturing his heart and soul, providing him with unconditional love and understanding. Do I possess the wisdom and compassion required to fulfill this role?> The notion of extending maternal care toward the Godking felt both empowering and humbling, as she contemplated the boundless love and strength it demanded.

Celestria‚Äôs heart and mind raced with these thoughts, her resolve faltering momentarily as she grappled with the enormity of what was being asked of her. Yet, she knew deep within her that this was the path she had chosen, the destiny she had long embraced, and the commitment she had made not only to her King, but also to herself.

With a breath drawn deep into her chest, Celestria raised her eyes to meet the Godking Primoris‚Äôs gaze, her voice unwavering as she spoke her heartfelt response:

‚ÄúYour grace, I understand the multitude of roles you require me to embody, and I promise to devote myself wholly to fulfilling each and every one of them. I know that I may falter at times, that I may struggle to find the balance, but I will continue to grow, learn and adapt, remaining steadfast in my dedication to you and our nation. I am ready and willing to be everything your heart desires‚Äìand more.‚Äù

As the words left her lips, Celestria felt the full weight of her decision settle upon her once more. Yet, there was a newfound sense of determination and conviction within her, an unwavering belief that she had the strength, resilience, and love to make this daunting dream a reality. Not just for her Godking, but for herself.

Dullsville 1900
Boredom

San Francisco 1906
Earthquake
Damage from the earthquake was minor compared to that of the ensuing fires, which took days to control. 1500 people died. Controlling the fires should be your initial concern. Then clear the rubble and start rebuilding. You have 5 years.

Tokyo 1957
Monster Attack

Analyze the following text:

RAMPAGE

The game where the nice guys don't get a look in.

Grab your way through Chicago, punch up New York, and jump on San Francisco.

Three indescribably nasty characters which bear a remarkable likeness to King Kong, Godzilla and Wolf-man, need you to send them on a rampage in an enduring 768 days of destruction, through 85 different cities.

---

Playing the Game

To play the game, move your monster up and down buildings and through the town, punching and chomping as you go.

To climb the walls of a building, move right or left to approach it. Then move up to climb.

As you climb, you can punch huge gaping holes in the building, grab and chomp people out of it -- even snatch TVs, flower pots, and all kinds of yummy morsels. But remember, some of them can be quite hazardous to your health!

Picking Off Helicopters and Other Antagonists

Trashing cities wouldn't be as much fun if no one tried to stop you. But don't worry. They will.

Puny helicopters will try to lay into you with a round of machine gun fire. Just punch 'em right out of the air.

Soldiers will try to blast you off with rifles. Turn these pesky GIs into hors d'oeuvres. But stay away from the guy with the dynamite -- eating TNT will give you a bad case of indigestion.

Tanks, trolleys, trucks, taxis, boats, and police cars will scurry away in a panic. You can simply punch them out of commission.

Helpless pedestrians can't really hurt you. But don't let that stop you from devouring them.

Other Tasty Treats

In addition to those delectable helicopters and vehicles, there are other tasty little tidbits hidden throughout the game. Most of them can be found inside the buildings -- especially when the windows are open. And many of them must be gobbled up at just the right moment.

You'll gain valuable energy when you munch on the right thing at the right time. But you'll lose energy if you devour the wrong thing at the wrong time. There are other ways to gain and lose energy, too.

The following list shows which is which:

Gain Energy by Consuming:
people
soldiers
goldfish
toast when it's up
milk
bowls of fruit
watermelon
turkeys
hamburgers
another monster (after it's shrunk back into a human)
jugs of water

Lose Energy by:
eating poison
eating cactus
eating a candle
punching a toaster alone
eating dynamite
punching a light bulb when it's on
getting punched by another monster
getting shot
getting too close to explosions
punching a TV when it's on
falling off a building
falling into the water
being hit by thrown dynamite

Keep an Eye on Your Energy Level

The damage bar directly under your score lets you know how you're doing. And if you run out of energy completely, you'll automatically turn into a measly human. At which point you'll quickly find out who your true friends are.

What's the Point?

What makes having so much fun even more fun is that you get points for almost everything you punch or chomp throughout your escapade.

Here's what earns what:

Punching holes in buildings: 50-250 points each
Punching helicopters: 225
Punching other vehicles: 250-1000
Punching TV when off: 250-1000
Punching a train: 200
Picking up money: 250-1000 points each
Picking up a light bulb when off: 250-1000
Picking up safe: 250-1000
Picking flowers: 250-1000

Matthias Bastian
GPT-4 goes a little AGI with Auto-GPT
Midjourney prompted by THE DECODER
GPT-4 goes a little AGI with Auto-GPT
Content
summary
Summary
Language models can speed up and automate many tasks in areas such as text or code. What happens when they run themselves?

This new trend in generative AI is also called ‚Äúself-prompting‚Äù or ‚Äúauto-prompting‚Äù. The language model develops and executes prompts that can lead to new prompts based on an initial input.

This approach becomes truly powerful when combined with tools such as web search or the ability to test written code. The language model becomes an automatic assistant that can do much more than just generate text or code.

‚Äú1 GPT call is a bit like 1 thought. Stringing them together in loops creates agents that can perceive, think, and act, their goals defined in English in prompts,‚Äù writes OpenAI developer Andrej Karpathy, predicting a future of ‚ÄúAutoOrgs‚Äù made up of ‚ÄúAutoCEOs,‚Äù ‚ÄúAutoCFOs,‚Äù and so on.

Ad

Auto-GPT: Self-Prompting is the latest trend in large language models
The most popular self-prompting example at the moment is the experimental open source application ‚ÄúAuto-GPT‚Äù. According to the Github team, the Python application is designed to independently develop and manage business ideas and generate income.

The program plans step-by-step, justifies decisions and develops plans, which it documents. In addition to integrating GPT-4 for text generation, the system has Internet access for data retrieval, can store data, and can generate speech via the Elevenlabs API. Supposedly, the system is even capable of self-improvement and bug-fixing by generating Python scripts via GPT-4.

External media content (Twitter) has been blocked here. When loading or playing, connections are established to the servers of the respective providers. Personal data may be communicated to the providers in the process. You can find more information in our privacy policy.

Allow external media content
The following demo shows how the system, acting as a ‚Äúchief GPT,‚Äù autonomously researches upcoming events, identifies ‚ÄúEarth Day,‚Äù and generates a fancy recipe idea appropriate for that day.

Video Player

00:00
01:46

Video: Auto-GPT-4, Github

From language model to everyday helper
The idea behind Auto-GPT and similar projects like Baby-AGI or Jarvis (HuggingGPT) is to network language models and functions to automate complex tasks. The language model acts as a kind of controller that uses other language or expert models and tools in an automated way to achieve a given goal as autonomously as possible.

‚ÄúBy leveraging the strong language capability of ChatGPT and abundant AI models in Hugging Face, HuggingGPT is able to cover numerous sophisticated AI tasks in different modalities and domains and achieve impressive results in language, vision, speech, and other challenging tasks, which paves a new way towards advanced artificial intelligence,‚Äù writes the team behind HuggingGPT.

Language models as a platform
The idea of using language models to go beyond pure text generation is not new: The startup Adept is working on a universal text control system that allows a language model agent to search a website, research Wikipedia, or operate Excel using only language. OpenAI has officially introduced a concept with similar automation potential as an upcoming feature with the ChatGPT plugins.

Early experiments show that robots can also benefit from the language understanding and world knowledge of large language models. For example, Google uses natural language to control household robots that can combine language understanding with environment and object recognition to perform multistep actions without pre-programming. The following example shows a simple homemade robot that can respond to complex natural language commands with humor thanks to GPT-4 connectivity.

External media content (www.youtube.com) has been blocked here. When loading or playing, connections are established to the servers of the respective providers. Personal data may be communicated to the providers in the process. You can find more information in our privacy policy.

Allow external media content
Using auto-prompting for brainstorming is also interesting: given a topic, GPT-4 generates prompts that lead to new prompts, and so on. The software records the results in a mind map structure. The developer calls this ‚Äúbrainstorming on absolute steroids‚Äù.

Summary
Language models can be more than text generators: By generating and executing their own prompts, they guide themselves to a given goal.
Currently, there are a number of experiments like Auto-GPT that try to use language models in this way. ChatGPT's plugins also rely on the steering function of large language models.
Language models can also be used as universal computer assistants or in robotics to control everyday robots.
